DataElement.preferredName: Musculoskeletal Symptom How Much Activity of Daily Living Affected Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents how much activities of daily living are affected by musculoskeletal symptoms.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Organ System Musculoskeletal Symptom Quantity Activity of Daily Living Affected
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure that consists of organs and organ subclasses responsible for certain body functions.  Representative examples are the gastrointestinal system, urinary system, and hematopoietic system._Having to do with muscles, bones, tendons, ligaments, joints, and cartilage._Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._Those physical activities which are required for our daily existence. These include personal maintenance activities and activities for maintenance of our living space, as well as activities related to independent living._To be influenced by or changed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure that consists of organs and organ subclasses responsible for certain body functions.  Representative examples are the gastrointestinal system, urinary system, and hematopoietic system.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure that consists of organs and organ subclasses responsible for certain body functions.  Representative examples are the gastrointestinal system, urinary system, and hematopoietic system.

Property.preferredName: Musculoskeletal Symptom Quantity Activity of Daily Living Affected
Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with muscles, bones, tendons, ligaments, joints, and cartilage.:Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:Those physical activities which are required for our daily existence. These include personal maintenance activities and activities for maintenance of our living space, as well as activities related to independent living.:To be influenced by or changed.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to the muscles and skeleton.
Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

Those physical activities which are required for our daily existence. These include personal maintenance activities and activities for maintenance of our living space, as well as activities related to independent living.
To be influenced by or changed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for 17-C-0027 Chronic GVHD Review of Systems History Screening form. mc 1/11/17

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe problems with performing their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe problems with performing their usual activities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of a degree of agreement that is approximately halfway between the highest and lowest degrees of agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of a degree of agreement that is approximately halfway between the highest and lowest degrees of agreement.
A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for 17-C-0027 Chronic GVHD Review of Systems History Screening form. mc 1/10/17

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for 17-C-0027 Chronic GVHD Review of Systems History Screening form. mc 1/12/17
